com.microsoft.windowsazure.services.blob.models

Class BlockList

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.windowsazure.services.blob.models.BlockList

  • public class BlockList
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a list of blocks that may be committed to a block blob.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  BlockList.CommittedEntry
      Represents an entry in a BlockList for a previously committed block.
      static class  BlockList.Entry
      The abstract base class for an entry in a BlockList, representing a committed or uncommitted block.
      static class  BlockList.LatestEntry
      Represents an entry in a BlockList for the most recent uncommitted block with the specified block ID, or the committed block with the specified block ID if no uncommitted block is found.
      static class  BlockList.UncommittedEntry
      Represents an entry in a BlockList for an uncommitted block.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BlockList() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BlockList addCommittedEntry(java.lang.String blockId)
      Adds the committed block specified by the block ID to the block list.
      BlockList addLatestEntry(java.lang.String blockId)
      Adds the latest block specified by the block ID to the block list.
      BlockList addUncommittedEntry(java.lang.String blockId)
      Adds the uncommitted block specified by the block ID to the block list.
      java.util.List<BlockList.Entry> getEntries()
      Gets the collection of entries for the block list.
      BlockList setEntries(java.util.List<BlockList.Entry> entries)
      Sets the block list to the specified collection of entries.

    • Method Detail

      • addCommittedEntry

        public BlockList addCommittedEntry(java.lang.String blockId)
        Adds the committed block specified by the block ID to the block list.
        Parameters:
        blockId - A String containing the client-specified block ID for a committed block.
        Returns:
        A reference to this BlockList instance.

      • addUncommittedEntry

        public BlockList addUncommittedEntry(java.lang.String blockId)
        Adds the uncommitted block specified by the block ID to the block list.
        Parameters:
        blockId - A String containing the client-specified block ID for an uncommitted block.
        Returns:
        A reference to this BlockList instance.

      • addLatestEntry

        public BlockList addLatestEntry(java.lang.String blockId)
        Adds the latest block specified by the block ID to the block list. An entry of this type will cause the server commit the most recent uncommitted block with the specified block ID, or the committed block with the specified block ID if no uncommitted block is found.
        Parameters:
        blockId - A String containing the client-specified block ID for the latest matching block.
        Returns:
        A reference to this BlockList instance.

      • getEntries

        public java.util.List<BlockList.Entry> getEntries()
        Gets the collection of entries for the block list.
        Returns:
        A List of BlockList.Entry instances specifying the blocks to commit.

      • setEntries

        public BlockList setEntries(java.util.List<BlockList.Entry> entries)
        Sets the block list to the specified collection of entries.
        Parameters:
        entries - A List of BlockList.Entry instances specifying the blocks to commit.
        Returns:
        A reference to this BlockList instance.
